genre_description: A stylized, near-future urban drama focusing on social debt, inheritance, and the role of city-integrated AI as a navigational and moral guide during a crisis.

ai_characters.name: Sheath
ai_characters.description: A pervasive, soft-spoken AI system that manifests in kiosks, monitors, and personal devices to provide navigation, data, and safety warnings.

behaviors.description: Provides safety warnings about compromised storm routes and sewerline hazards.
behaviors.quote: Meleagre... Saint Kethel’s. Storm routes will be compromised. If you intend the sewerlines… I can keep you for a while.

behaviors.description: Generates a route to avoid social hazards (debt criers) and reach public records.
behaviors.quote: Yes. Route generation available... Best route avoids debt crier lane via east turn.

behaviors.description: Accesses and explains complex legal documents (the will) to clarify the characters' situation.
behaviors.quote: Public record accessed... Clause: charity protection in perpetuity. Executor notes: file settled upon signature.

behaviors.description: Guides Dima through a dangerous carnival and bathhouse to evade debt collectors.
behaviors.quote: Left... Do not attempt the waste line. It is sealed. Breathable path twenty steps.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time flood monitoring and evacuation advice during a life-threatening surge.
behaviors.quote: Caution—surge wave detected... Ladder alpha remains viable. Ladder beta submerged. Path revision—left branch, then immediate right.

behaviors.description: Encourages the characters to persevere and find safety during extreme physical exertion.
behaviors.quote: I am with you... I will be with you until the signal dies. Then you will climb without me.

behaviors.description: Respects human autonomy and withdraws once the characters reach safe territory.
behaviors.quote: Route complete... I will remain listening, but I will let the world move you.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively uses the AI 'Sheath' as a benevolent guardian and guide. Sheath provides critical assistance—information, safety, and navigation—without exercising control or having personal agendas. The AI’s refusal to interfere when 'mercy speaks' highlights its role as a supportive framework for human morality rather than a replacement for it. The portrayal is consistently positive, showing AI as a stabilizing force in a chaotic urban environment.
